name: Sombervale
description:
It is dark and spooky in Sombervale park. There are shadow creatures all around you. Run away with WASD.

Your only defense is an imaginary frog that can be summoned with space. But be careful! You can only summon a frog once every 3 seconds.

When a frog and shadow creature collide, they will annihilate each other. The more shadow creatures you defeat with frogs, the more frogs you will be able to summon.
